archiefmat.titel: Stukken ten aanzien van de defensie en bestuur van de koloniën in West-Indië; stukken met betrekking tot Curaçao, Essequebo en Suriname
archiefmat.titel_eng: Documents regarding the defense and administration of the colonies in the West Indies; documents regarding CuraÃ§ao, Essequibo and Suriname
archiefmat.scope: Inventory number 7 contains documents regarding the defense of the colonies on the Guinea Coast and in the West Indies. The numbers 235-237 contain extracts from the resolutions by the States General, the States of Holland, West India Company and Society of Suriname among other things regarding the administration of the colonies in the West Indies. Number 238 contains a collection of documents pertaining to the West India Company and especially regarding Curaçao, Essequibo and Suriname.
